name: 2D Space Shooter - MSU
description:
This is my build for my 2D Shooter for Michigan State University. 

For my modifications, I plan to try and change some of the art (currently debating if I should stay in the space theme or completely "reskin" it to be a western cowboy theme), composing and adding music (either to fit a new theme or to improve the current space theme), and including at least one more level and changing the levels that I currently have so far. 

How to Play:

[Move with WASD, Shoot with Left Click, Screenshot with C Key]
